message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $110. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?

I understand where you're coming from, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I think $100 is a more reasonable price for this amazing product. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
